name: Mandragora
desc: When pulled from the ground against its will, it produces an unbearable scream that knocks everyone around it unconscious.

name: Argemona
desc: Its body contains enough deadly toxins to wipe out a human city.

name: Kitsune
desc: Greater number of tails indicates an older, wiser and more powerful Kitsune.

name: Kappa
desc: It lives on banks of rivers and ponds, playing pranks on unsuspecting travellers.

name: Sahuagin
desc: Using fog to disguise itself, it gets close to the prey and drags it underwater.

name: Harpy
desc: It will try to snatch away anything that catches its eye, though it will likely forget about the thing right away.

name: Siren
desc: Possessing a beautiful singing voice, it lures sailors on sea rocks to scavenge on shipwrecks.

name: Merrow
desc: An ambivalent creature that longs for the sea when on land and for land when in the sea.

name: Werebat
desc: Good sense of smell and outstanding hearing allows it to hunt in pitch-dark places.

name: Angel
desc: Believed to be characters of legends, these creatures only show themselves to humans in times of great trouble.
